name: missofis-request-interceptor
description: A browser extension to intercept HTTP requests

scripts.postversion: git add package.json package-lock.json extension/manifest.json && git commit -m"Updated to v$npm_package_version" && node bin/includes/echo-version-info.js name=$npm_package_name version=$npm_package_version
